TopicTitle: cBBp SPC Pack v0.4: Fixed Failcan RCS and added some adapter pieces. Enjoy.

Articles.Content: Is that tank for C&C or something?
it was for Supreme commander. the animal is a capybara.
Now I see the Cybran design theme.
Is it just me or does that capybara have its front feet on backwards? Did you whip it up in 5 seconds just for this thread?!

Is it just me or does that capybara have its front feet on backwards? Did you whip it up in 5 seconds just for this thread?!

obviously you never studied Capybara feet. that is how they are in the front. weird i agree but true.

But no that took a few hours.

we could ask Down Under Party Supplies to resize their Mei Long capsule to 1.5m

*cough* The one I asked them to make *cough*

I have to admit a mei long type capsule would be great. With integrated RCS? That way it would allow for a smaller orbital upper stage. Or it would be perfect for a lander as you could have a shorter, lower centre of gravity yet still have moneverability on the way back home.

I have to admit a mei long type capsule would be great. With integrated RCS? That way it would allow for a smaller orbital upper stage. Or it would be perfect for a lander as you could have a shorter, lower centre of gravity yet still have moneverability on the way back home.

I agree, that\'s what the DU pack was missing from the Mei Long.

K I got the Alpha of the capsule done to see if what i want is even possible. and it is. a capsule with engines, rcs, and emergency parachute and such with nose cones and enough fuel for powered landing.

Anyone care to take care of the RCS effect angles and such for me? i hate those. i cannot figure out the numbers at all this one mvoes it up one time the next time it is sideways.. then Q and E effects stop working. I have no idea.
looks like a high-yield MIRV warhead... =P

looks like a high-yield MIRV warhead... =P

only because it is not textured or detailed yet. i was merely maiking the models basic to test they will look different with alittle paint and extra detail to them.
Great! Thanks.
I wish I wasn\'t such a shitty modeler, I\'d help you out otherwise.
modelliing is cake. the effect code is the problem

modelliing is cake. the effect code is the problem

That\'s what I meant, I SUCK at effect placement. On some of my personal parts, it took me about 50 times to get the effects placed right.
added some detail to RCS.
I\'ll go wait for the capsule to be released before I\'ll download it. Nice pack

added some detail to RCS.

Can you squeeze a little ASAS below the parachute? That\'d be nice.
Oh, and could you add the dragon service module/trunk?
there will be no parachute.

there will be no parachute.

Why not? I\'d like to use the engines for deorbiting and landing, but I would need a backup.
yeah the dragon will definitely have a backup shoot even when it can land under power

yeah the dragon will definitely have a backup shoot even when it can land under power

Jeb insists there are no chutes. Atleast while ASAS is not working right :/ it doesn\'t use the RCS to correct path. and parachute makes things break with out ASAS and RCS team working. AKA i did make a parachute but no go till ASAS works

anyway a little detail goes a long way.
Looking good.

Jeb insists there are no chutes. Atleast while ASAS is not working right :/ it doesn\'t use the RCS to correct path. and parachute makes things break with out ASAS and RCS team working. AKA i did make a parachute but no go till ASAS works

Not sure I understand, once a chute is deployed, if the drag is high enough it pretty much orients your velocity vector straight down, not much stabilization left.
